| distributor = Wild Bunch released = runtime = 90 minutes country = United
| Kingdom language = English
}} 'Broken' is a 2012 British coming-of-age drama film directed by Rufus Norris
starring Eloise Laurence and Tim Roth. The film premiered at the Cannes Film
Festival in May 2012.
